name: Chaos Balls
description:
A game made in 6 days for GavinCraft's It's a Winter Wonder-Jam! with the prompt: "Organised-Chaos". Made in Godot, art and programming by me.

Organise as many balls as possible in 60 seconds by whacking them into the goals using your baseball bat- but be careful, as getting hit by one will lead to an instant game-over!

Controls:

WASD = move

mouse = look around

left click = swing your bat
